resume_markdown:
# DARWHIN GOMEZ

New York, NY | 347-491-2955 | Darwhin88@gmail.com  
[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin) | [GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)  

## PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY  
Detail-oriented Data Analyst with robust expertise in SQL, Python, and Excel, complemented by a strong foundation in financial markets and risk management. Proven track record in developing prototypes to demonstrate innovative solutions, enhancing stakeholder engagement and decision-making. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams, including Global Markets Financial Risk and Model Risk Management, to align business requirements with analytical insights. Committed to leveraging data-driven strategies to drive impactful results in fast-paced environments.

## EDUCATION  
**City University of New York**  
Master of Science in Data Science and Machine Learning, Expected Jan 2026, GPA: 4.0  
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Information Systems, June 2024, GPA: 3.78  
Dean’s List (8x), National Honor Society  

## EXPERIENCE  
**Solutions Architect Intern**  
Amazon Web Services (AWS) | Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
Jun 2025 – Sep 2025  
- Designed and presented secure, scalable AWS architectures tailored to enterprise client needs.  
- Developed proof-of-concept (POC) solutions integrating Generative AI and data analytics to discover actionable business insights.  
- Built and deployed a fully automated sentiment analysis pipeline processing over 1M feedback records, enabling 5× faster feedback-to-action turnaround.  
- Fine-tuned foundational models in Amazon SageMaker, achieving a 5% increase in output accuracy.  

**Software Developer Intern**  
WOPLLI Technologies | Remote, NY  
Jun 2024 – Sep 2024  
- Designed a Virtual Credential System for decentralized identity ecosystems.  
- Configured and tested Azure environments for secure application hosting.  
- Developed data flow and architecture diagrams aligned with data governance policies.  

**IT Support Intern**  
Mayor’s Office of Information Services | New York, NY  
Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting with Python scripts, reducing manual workload.  
- Monitored security logs to identify abnormal activities, escalating when appropriate.  
- Supported VIP users, ensuring secure system access (Active Directory, VPN).  

**IT Instructor Assistant**  
RF CUNY & Generation USA (Choose-U) | Remote, NY  
Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered 36 lessons on IT support, Linux, PowerShell, and scripting for 200+ learners.  
- Achieved a 96% cohort graduation rate by tailoring instruction with learner data insights.  

## TECHNICAL SKILLS  
- **Programming Languages:** Python, SQL, R, Java  
- **Data Science & ML:** Statistical Modeling, Forecasting, Anomaly Detection  
- **Databases:** MSSQL, MySQL, NoSQL  
- **Tools & Frameworks:** Git, Docker, Tableau, Power BI  
- **Cloud:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS)  

## CERTIFICATIONS  
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate  
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Generative AI  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate  

## LANGUAGES  
- English (Fluent)  
- Spanish (Fluent)  

## PROFESSIONAL COMMUNITIES  
- Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers  
- SPS Artificial Intelligence Club
